title: How to Make Mirepoix

steps.headline: Prepared the ingredients.
Heat the butter in a saucepan.
steps.description: Add the chopped ingredients and the thyme and bay leaf.

steps.headline: Stir the ingredients together in the butter.
steps.description: Place a lid over the saucepan and allow the mirepoix to cook gently (on low heat) for 20 minutes, or until the vegetables become tender.

steps.headline: Use.
steps.description: Remove from the heat once tender and either add to sauces or use as a garnish.
